segment.source: Customizing the Self-Service Portal for Your Organization
segment.target: Customizing the Self-Service Portal for Your Organization

segment.source: Customizing the Self-Service Portal for Your Organization
segment.target: Customizing the Self-Service Portal for Your Organization

segment.source: Customizing the Self-Service Portal for Your Organization
segment.target: Customizing the Self-Service Portal for Your Organization

segment.source: After configuring the Self-Service Portal, you will want to customize it for your organization by adding custom notice text, your company name, and other company-specific information.
segment.target: After configuring the Self-Service Portal, you will want to customize it for your organization by adding custom notice text, your company name, and other company-specific information.

segment.source: Customizing the Self-Service Portal information
segment.target: Customizing the Self-Service Portal information

segment.source: You can customize the Self-Service Portal in the following ways:
segment.target: You can customize the Self-Service Portal in the following ways:

segment.source: What you can do
segment.target: What you can do

segment.source: Instructions
segment.target: Instructions

segment.source: You can brand the Self-Service Portal with your company name, Help Desk URL, and can change the Session Time-out setting to make the end user’s session expire after a specified period of inactivity.
segment.target: You can brand the Self-Service Portal with your company name, Help Desk URL, and can change the Session Time-out setting to make the end user’s session expire after a specified period of inactivity.

segment.source: How to Set the Self-Service Portal Branding and Session Time-out
segment.target: How to Set the Self-Service Portal Branding and Session Time-out

segment.source: You can turn the Self-Service Portal notice text on or off.
segment.target: You can turn the Self-Service Portal notice text on or off.

segment.source: How to Turn the Self-Service Portal Notice Text On or Off
segment.target: How to Turn the Self-Service Portal Notice Text On or Off

segment.source: You can configure a localized version of the Self-Service Portal HelpdeskText statement, which tells end users how to get additional help when they are using the Self-Service Portal.
segment.target: You can configure a localized version of the Self-Service Portal HelpdeskText statement, which tells end users how to get additional help when they are using the Self-Service Portal.

segment.source: How to Localize the “HelpdeskText” Statement that Points Users to More Self-Service Portal Information
segment.target: How to Localize the “HelpdeskText” Statement that Points Users to More Self-Service Portal Information

segment.source: You can configure a localized version of the Self-Service Portal HelpdeskURL to display to end users by default.
segment.target: You can configure a localized version of the Self-Service Portal HelpdeskURL to display to end users by default.

segment.source: How to Localize the Self-Service Portal “HelpdeskURL”
segment.target: How to Localize the Self-Service Portal “HelpdeskURL”

segment.source: You can configure localized notice text to display to end users by default in the Self-Service Portal.
segment.target: You can configure localized notice text to display to end users by default in the Self-Service Portal.

segment.source: How to Localize the Self-Service Portal Notice Text
segment.target: How to Localize the Self-Service Portal Notice Text

segment.target: Got a suggestion for MBAM?

segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.target: For MBAM issues, use the MBAM TechNet Forum.
